scripts.electron-make-dev: npm install && npm run env dev && npm run build
scripts.electron-make-staging: npm install && npm run env staging && npm run build
scripts.electron-make-prod: npm install && npm run env prod && npm run build
scripts.electron-make-frontend: npm install && npm run env frontend && npm run build
scripts.electron-make-dev-mac: npm install && npm run env dev && npm run make-Mac
scripts.electron-make-staging-mac: npm install && npm run env staging && npm run make-Mac
scripts.electron-make-prod-mac: npm install && npm run env prod && npm run make-Mac
scripts.electron-make-frontend-mac: npm install && npm run env frontend && npm run make-Mac
